entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero with patchy frost.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening and before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
